metadata.description: Comprehensive knowledge base for geDIG evaluation covering multiple domains

knowledge_items.text: Energy is the capacity to do work and exists in various forms.
Information is the reduction of uncertainty in a system.
Entropy measures the disorder or randomness in a system.
Neural networks process information through weighted connections.
DNA encodes genetic information in a four-letter alphabet.
Quantum states can exist in superposition until measured.
Consciousness involves integrated information processing.
Evolution optimizes organisms through natural selection.
Black holes have maximum entropy for their size.
Computation requires minimum energy per bit erased.
Shannon entropy and thermodynamic entropy share mathematical structure.
Living systems decrease local entropy by increasing global entropy.
Quantum entanglement creates non-local correlations between particles.
Neural plasticity allows brains to reorganize and form new connections.
Information cannot be destroyed in quantum mechanics.
Machine learning extracts patterns from high-dimensional data.
Genetic algorithms mimic evolutionary processes for optimization.
Thermodynamic arrow of time emerges from entropy increase.
Synaptic pruning optimizes brain connectivity during development.
Landauer's principle links information erasure to heat generation.
Maxwell's demon thought experiment connects information and thermodynamics.
Protein folding minimizes free energy to find stable configurations.
Holographic principle suggests information is encoded on boundaries.
Attention mechanisms in AI focus computational resources selectively.
Epigenetics shows how environment influences gene expression.
Wave function collapse may be an information update process.
Emergence occurs when simple rules produce complex behaviors.
Feedback loops can amplify or dampen system responses.
Phase transitions mark qualitative changes in system behavior.
Self-organization creates order without external control.
Energy, information, and entropy form a fundamental trinity in physics.
Life can be viewed as a far-from-equilibrium dissipative structure.
Consciousness might emerge from integrated information processing.
Evolution can be understood as an information optimization process.
Quantum computing exploits superposition for parallel processing.
The universe might be fundamentally computational in nature.
Intelligence involves prediction, compression, and pattern recognition.
Creativity emerges from novel connections between existing concepts.
Memory consolidation involves replay and reorganization of experiences.
Language enables infinite expression from finite components.
Fractals show self-similarity across different scales.
Chaos theory reveals sensitive dependence on initial conditions.
Network effects create value through increased connectivity.
Symmetry breaking leads to diversity in physical systems.
Renormalization reveals universal behaviors across scales.
Autopoiesis describes self-creating and self-maintaining systems.
Stigmergy enables indirect coordination through environmental modification.
Swarm intelligence emerges from simple local interactions.
Metacognition involves thinking about thinking processes.
Embodied cognition suggests mind emerges from body-environment interaction.
Can consciousness be quantified through integrated information theory?
Is the universe a quantum computer processing information?
How does quantum mechanics relate to consciousness?
Can artificial systems achieve genuine understanding?
What is the relationship between computation and physics?
How does complexity emerge from simplicity?
Is information more fundamental than matter and energy?
Can evolution be directed through information design?
What are the limits of predictability in complex systems?
How does meaning emerge from syntax in language and thought?
The observer and observed are fundamentally inseparable in quantum mechanics.
All physical laws might reduce to information conservation principles.
Consciousness could be the universe's way of observing itself.
Intelligence is compression - finding minimal descriptions of reality.
Time might emerge from entanglement and information flow.
Life accelerates entropy production while creating local order.
Creativity is the universe exploring its possibility space.
Memory is time travel through information preservation.
Language is collective consciousness encoded in symbols.
Mathematics is the universe's self-description language.
Free will might emerge from quantum indeterminacy amplified by chaos.
Dark matter could be information structures beyond standard physics.
Dreams might be consciousness exploring counterfactual realities.
Intuition accesses implicit patterns below conscious threshold.
Synchronicity reveals hidden causal connections in reality.
Collective intelligence transcends individual cognitive limits.
Technology extends human cognition into the environment.
Culture is distributed cognition across minds and time.
Art explores the space between order and chaos.
Science is systematic curiosity encoded in methodology.
Meditation might access fundamental computational substrates of mind.
Psychedelics could reveal alternative information processing modes.
Music is emotional information encoded in temporal patterns.
Love might be recognition of deep informational resonance.
Death is information pattern dissolution and transformation.
Virtual reality creates new experiential possibility spaces.
Blockchain enables trustless information consensus.
Internet forms a global nervous system for humanity.
AI might discover alien forms of intelligence and consciousness.
Biotechnology enables conscious evolution and design.
Nanotechnology bridges quantum and classical information realms.
Space exploration extends consciousness beyond Earth.
Sustainability requires balancing information and energy flows.
Democracy is distributed information processing for governance.
Economics tracks information about value and scarcity.
Education is intergenerational information transfer and transformation.
Ethics emerges from recognition of shared information patterns.
Beauty might signal deep informational coherence and harmony.
Wisdom integrates knowledge across multiple domains and timescales.
The future is the universe computing its next state from present information.
